name: WB Product Enquiry
author: Wojciech Borowicz

sections.description:
Change your existing ecommerce site into a catalog, let your customers ask questions about products you sell!
It will let you change your existing ecommerce site into a catalog, where customers can browse your products, but they cannot buy them directly through WooCommerce cart.
To keep their intereset, you can turn on a second mode, which will add a product enquiry form on product page instead of an add to cart button! You can also enable product enquiry mode WITHOUT disabling ecommerce part of your store.
This will make your customers life easier in case they have any questions about your products.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wb-product-enquiry directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Product Enquiry->Settings screen to configure the plugin and enable modes you want.
  4. Enjoy!
sections.faq:
How to add new fields on a contact form?

This feature will be added in mid February 2021.

What is planned in next versions?

I am planning to add following features: advanced styling control, statistics charts, a mode for enabling product enquiries for specific products, fields manager and many, many more. Install and wait for updates :).
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Stable version of a plugin

1.1

  • New features: set custom product enquiry recipients, hide or show prices in the catalog mode, disable enquiries saving.
  • Improved the way plugin is loaded
  • Dashboard with statistics and contact form labels controls coming up in first week of February.

1.2

  • NEW : Simple statistics dashboard – will be upgraded soon
  • NEW : Rename form labels
  • NEW : Export enquiries as CSV using bulk actions
  • TWEAK : Submit button gets disabled when clicked, to avoid submitting two enquiries

1.21

  • FIX : Defaults for empty labels
  • FIX : Admin css not attached in 1.2

1.23

  • TWEAK : Enquiry admin single page brings up enquiry details. (Added metabox)

1.25

*TWEAK : Charts styling improvements
